pages.text: The damage caused by accumulating EMC is called EMCWorld Real Damage. $(br2)When calculating this damage, it $(c)ignores$() the target's armor, potion effects, and fixed damage reduction attributes.

Any damage caused by $(3)staves$() is considered EMCWorld Real Damage, and all weapons that can cause area damage also belong to EMCWorld Real Damage. $(br2)Entities killed by EMCWorld Real Damage, except for Gaia Guardians, are not considered player kills. $(br2)However, the damage caused by EMCWorld Real Damage is counted towards the output leaderboard in raids.
